description: Now under new management, this historic restaurant in the centre of Bolzano occupies the ground floor of the attractive Palazzo Pock overlooking the square. Here, elegant, contemporary-style dining rooms with charming vaulted ceilings provide the setting for Mediterranean-influenced cuisine with a distinctly contemporary flavour.
